subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Six days of the week, Jets Head Coach Eric Mangini practices impassivity. But on game days, his passion for the game and his regard for those who play it at its highest level is there for all to see.
snippet: Six days of the week, Jets Head Coach Eric Mangini practices impassivity. But on game days, his passion for the game and his regard for those who play it at its highest level is there for all to see.
